code: import React from'react';import Course from'./Courses/Course';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const getRows=courses=>courses.sort((a,b)=>{let ret=0;if(a.university>b.university)ret=-1;else if(a.university<b.university)ret=1;else if(a.number>b.number)ret=1;else if(a.number<b.number)ret=-1;return ret;}).map((course,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Course,{data:course,last:idx===courses.length-1},course.title));const Courses=_ref=>{let{data}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"courses",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"link-to",id:"courses"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"title",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Selected Courses"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"course-list",children:getRows(data)})]});};Courses.defaultProps={data:[]};export default Courses;
